sentences.en: " Hi - Yi ! you're up a stump, ain't you! "
sentences.cn: “ 哎呀,你日子好过了, 是不是? ”

sentences.en: " With his face to the stump? "
a buyer would have to stump up at least £8.5 million for the site.
sentences.cn: 要购买那地块，买主至少要付850万英镑。

sentences.en: Babbitt sat on the stump, facing the dark pond, slapping mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 巴比特面对黑暗的池塘坐在树桩上, 不时拍打蚊子.

sentences.en: Customers do not have to stump up any cash for at least four weeks.
sentences.cn: 顾客们至少四周内都不必付钱。

sentences.en: He stamped out a cigarette stump.
He used the stump as a table.
He was on the stump in his home state.
sentences.cn: 他在自己家乡的州里到处发表政治演说.

sentences.en: He went on the stump in his home state.
sentences.cn: 他到故乡所在的州去发表演说.

sentences.en: I barked my shin on a tree stump.
sentences.cn: 我磕到了树桩上,胫部擦破了皮.

sentences.en: I can't for one instant believe that anything would stump her.
sentences.cn: 我相信不会有任何问题难得住她.

sentences.en: Mr Green has had to stump up for his son's debts.
sentences.cn: 格林先生只好为他儿子还帐.

sentences.en: The presidential candidates are on the stump today.
sentences.cn: 总统候选人今天在作巡回演说。

sentences.en: The tramp produced a stump of candle from his deep pockets.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉从深口袋里掏出了一截蜡烛。

sentences.en: We sat on a stump to take a rest.

words.tran_cn: 难题；伐木机；竞选演说者；板球三柱门守球员

phrases.tran_cn: 拿出，付出；付清所需要的钱
(美, 非正式)被难住，陷入困境

trans.tran_cn: （被砍下的树的）树桩，残余部分，假肢，（板球三柱门的）柱，残余部分
trans.tran_en: the bottom part of a tree that is left in the ground after the rest of it has been cut down

trans.tran_cn: 砍伐；使为难；在…作巡回政治演说
trans.tran_en: to travel around an area, meeting people and making speeches in order to gain political support

trans.tran_cn: 截去…的干，碰踢，用擦笔调整画的色调，[非正式用语] 向（某人）挑战
trans.tran_en: if you are stumped by a question or problem, you are unable to find an answer to it
